description: SSH configuration for multiple device RPC execution
notes: IMPORTANT: Set the correct 'sudoPassword' for each device to enable RPC execution
The RPC executable requires root privileges to access Intel ME hardware
Set 'useSudo' to false to try running without sudo (will likely fail with privilege errors)
Set global 'enabled' to true to use remote SSH execution instead of local Docker/Windows
Each device can have a separate 'sudoPassword' field for sudo authentication
If sudoPassword is not provided, the SSH password will be used for sudo
Tests will iterate through all enabled devices in the array
Ensure all remote hosts have Intel AMT hardware and /dev/mei0 device access
The RPC executable will be downloaded and extracted to /tmp on each remote host
Make sure password-based SSH authentication is configured and sshpass is installed on the test runner
